headline.print_headline: First Lady: US Experiencing Food 'Culture Change'
headline.main: First Lady: US Experiencing Food 'Culture Change'

docs.lead_paragraph: Michelle Obama said Thursday that the U.S. has undergone a "culture change" in the five years since she started raising awareness about childhood obesity. But as she celebrated achievements on multiple fronts, the first lady also warned that the progress that's been made is "incredibly fragile."
docs.snippet: Michelle Obama said Thursday that the U.S. has undergone a "culture change" in the five years since she started raising awareness about childhood obesity. But as she celebrated achievements on multiple fronts, the first lady also warned that the...

headline.print_headline: Aussie Actor Gets Sugar Rush From Low-Fat Health Foods
headline.main: Aussie Actor Gets Sugar Rush From Low-Fat Health Foods

docs.lead_paragraph: An Australian actor who set out to expose hidden sugar in health food said he gained 8.5 kg (19 lb) and a paunch after a 60-day low-fat diet, including yogurt, cereal, muesli bars and juices.
docs.snippet: An Australian actor who set out to expose hidden sugar in health food said he gained 8.5 kg (19 lb) and a paunch after a 60-day low-fat diet, including yogurt, cereal, muesli bars and juices.

headline.print_headline: Surgery for Obesity May Aid Pregnancies
headline.main: Bariatric Surgery Reduces Pregnancy Problems in Obese Women

docs.abstract: A study of nearly 3,000 obese women found that weight-loss surgery lowered the risk for some pregnancy complications like gestational diabetes and miscarriage.
docs.snippet: A study of nearly 3,000 obese women found that weight-loss surgery lowered the risk for some pregnancy complications like gestational diabetes and miscarriage.

docs.lead_paragraph: Food-industry representatives hate the recommendations in a new nutrition-panel report — a good indicator of its value — but they should become policy.
docs.snippet: Food-industry representatives hate the recommendations in a new nutrition-panel report — a good indicator of its value — but they should become policy.

headline.print_headline: Maker of a Drug to Treat Binge-Eating Marketed the Disease First
headline.main: Shire, Maker of Binge-Eating Drug Vyvanse, First Marketed the Disease

docs.abstract: Some critics say drug maker Shire is going too far in its marketing of Vyvanse, amphetamine-based drug that was recently approved to treat binge-eating disorder; Shire spent years before approval shaping public perception and diagnosis of binge-eating disorder, much as it did with ADHD in the past; controversy highlights marketing strategy that has yielded billions in profits and that many say presents public danger.
docs.lead_paragraph: The strategy for a new drug to treat binge-eating disorder reveals how a pharmaceutical company can influence the treatment of a medical condition.
docs.snippet: The strategy for a new drug to treat binge-eating disorder reveals how a pharmaceutical company can influence the treatment of a medical condition.

headline.print_headline: Food Habits Becoming Worse Around the World
headline.main: Food Habits Getting Worse Around the World

docs.abstract: Series of studies in journals The Lancet and Lancet Global Health points to worsening diet and increased obesity around world, particularly in countries with rising incomes; trends are occurring in tandem with increase of advertising targeting children by Western junk food and snack manufacturers.
docs.lead_paragraph: Some poor and middle-income countries with relatively healthy diets are being targeted by Western food companies with increased advertising.
docs.snippet: Some poor and middle-income countries with relatively healthy diets are being targeted by Western food companies with increased advertising.

headline.main: Behind New Dietary Guidelines, Better Science

docs.lead_paragraph: Government recommendations on how much fat and salt you should eat weren’t always based on the best available evidence. That may be changing.
docs.snippet: Government recommendations on how much fat and salt you should eat weren’t always based on the best available evidence. That may be changing.

headline.print_headline: World's Diet Worsening With Globalisation, Major Study Finds
headline.main: World's Diet Worsening With Globalisation, Major Study Finds

docs.lead_paragraph: The world's diet has deteriorated substantially in the last two decades, a leading nutrition expert said on Monday, citing one of the largest studies available on international eating habits.
docs.snippet: The world's diet has deteriorated substantially in the last two decades, a leading nutrition expert said on Monday, citing one of the largest studies available on international eating habits.

headline.print_headline: Appalachia Report Cites Progress, Challenges After 50 Years
headline.main: Appalachia Report Cites Progress, Challenges After 50 Years

docs.lead_paragraph: The agency created five decades ago to fight poverty in Appalachia has helped county economies grow with nearly $4 billion in spending, but the region still lags in key measures of educational, economic and physical well-being, according to a new study.
